menu.title: Menu 'Fitness'
menu.descr: The Fitness menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits.A product of active and healthy people.This is a completely new product with optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: Menu 'Lean
menu.descr: The “Fruit” menu is a thorough selection of ingredients: a complete absence of animal products, milk from almonds, oats, coconut or buckwheat, the correct amount of proteins due to tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: Premium menu
menu.descr: In the premium menu, we use not only a beautiful packaging design, but also a high -quality performance of dishes.Red fish, seafood, fruits - a restaurant menu without going to a restaurant!
